column4: ok I asked my question. is there any person here who can help me?

if you don't get an answer you can repeat the question.. but wait at least 10 minutes before doing so.. use the time to improve the question, provide a good description of your problem, search the ubuntu forums etc
just writing "anyone?" or "Can someone answer my question?" will just make people annoyed... noone likes to scroll around trying to find the actual question
